lefthandWords.words: Where do you live?|Do you live in a big flat?|What do they study at university?|Who do you live with?|Do you have any stamps?|Where do you work?|Do they study English?|What languages do you study?|Who do you work for?|Do you have a phone card?

righthandWords.words: I live in Madrid.|No, my flat's small.|They study English.|I live with my sister Natasha.|No, I don't have any.|I work in London.|Yes, they do.|I study Russian and Spanish.|I work for a telephone company.|Yes, I do have one.
